details.description: Hopeful, inquisitive, long-time fan and purveyor of all things digital. Founder of Chinwag, Exec Director of Social Media Week London and delighted to be working with the ODI on the first-ever ODI Summit and Gala Dinner on 29th Oct 2013 featuring Sir Tim Berners-Lee. Grab a ticket now. You'll find me @toodlepip on Twitter, on Linkedin and blogging at Chinwag and personal stuff at Toodlepip.
